REUTERS.UNKNOWN: E F f3214 reute r f BC-canbra-foods-ltd 03-16 0108

TEXT.TITLE: CANBRA FOODS SETS SPECIAL FIVE DLR/SHR PAYOUT
TEXT.BODY: <Canbra Foods Ltd>, earlier reporting a 1986 net profit against a year-ago loss, said it declared a special, one-time dividend of five dlrs per common share, pay March 31, record March 26. Canbra said it set the special payout to allow shareholders to participate in the gain on the sale of unit Stafford Foods Ltd in November, 1986, as well as the company's "unusually profitable performance" in 1986. Canbra earlier reported 1986 net earnings of 4.2 mln dlrs, excluding a 1.3 mln dlr gain on the Stafford sale, compared to a year-ago loss of 1.5 mln dlrs. Reuter
